content: this crossbody bag is sure going to turn heads with all of it s stunning texture and functionality what you need -4 mm and 5 mm crochet hook or hook to obtain gauge -i used lily sugar n cream cotton approximately 285 yards -25 mm snap fastener -10 inch closed zipper optional -yarn needle -measuring tape -scissors this is for the written crochet pattern only due to the nature of this purchase no refunds will be accepted
